 "cells": [

   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# Appendix B: List of Publications\n",
    "\n",
    "This is an incomplete list of publications that made use of `DustPy`.  \n",
    "If you want your publication to be listed here, please give us a note in the [Show & Tell](https://github.com/stammler/dustpy/discussions/categories/show-and-tell) category of [DustPy Discussions](https://github.com/stammler/dustpy/discussions/) or write us an [email](mailto:sebastian.stammler@gmail.com)."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "**2023**"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "* **Gárate, Matías; Birnstiel, Til; Pinilla, Paola; Andrews, Sean M.; Franz, Raphael; Stammler, Sebastian Markus; Picogna, Giovanni; Ercolano, Barbara; Miotello, Anna; Kurtovic, Nicolás T. (2023)**  \n",
    "Astronomy & Astrophysics, Volume 679, id.A15, 17 pp.  \n",
    "_\"Millimeter emission in photoevaporating disks is determined by early substructures\"_  \n",
    "[doi: 10.1051/0004-6361/202244436](https://doi.org/10.1051/0004-6361/202244436)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "* **Gárate, Matías; Pinilla, Paola; Haworth, Thomas J.; Facchini, Stefano (2023)**  \n",
    "eprint arXiv:2310.20214  \n",
    "_\"The external photoevaporation of structured protoplanetary disks\"_  \n",
    "[doi: 10.48550/arXiv.2310.20214](https://doi.org/10.48550/arXiv.2310.20214)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "* **Doi, Kiyoaki; Kataoka, Akimasa (2023)**  \n",

    "_\"Constraints on the Dust Size Distributions in the HD 163296 Disk from the Difference of the Apparent Dust Ring Widths between Two ALMA Bands\"_  \n",
    "[doi: 10.3847/1538-4357/acf5df](https://doi.org/10.3847/1538-4357/acf5df)"
   ]
  },

   "cell_type": "markdown",

    "_\"Grain-size measurements in protoplanetary disks indicate fragile pebbles and low turbulence\"_  \n",
    "[doi: 10.48550/arXiv.2311.07775](https://doi.org/10.48550/arXiv.2311.07775)"
